name: Trade Wins by the World Trade Centers Association
description: Conversations that educate and inspire our constituents as they create vibrant ecosystems of economic activity through their access to real estate, trade services, hospitality, and networking.

recent_episodes.title: 26:Success Stories from the 2021-2022 WTCA Champions Award Winners
recent_episodes.description:
Highlights from the conversation:

What it means to be a winner (1:30)What makes your WTC unique (20:46)Perspectives on global trade (29:19)Anecdotes to share (37:42)

Trade Wins is a podcast designed specifically to be thought-provoking and to provide insights from leading experts to help us navigate today’s changing environment. We aim to contribute to the empowerment of our global membership and their business networks in the world of global trade and investment.

score_reason: This interviews business leaders about international trade and economic development, which could accommodate Andreas's agency-building story and insights on competing in traditional industries, though it's not a perfect fit for his AI/marketing expertise.
